specialties: Adding security to items and houses
business: Runs the infamous prison of Dreadhold and other prisons
characteristics: A close alliance with House Sivis
Worked to earn the trust of its clients and to establish a reputation for unshakeable integrity
No love of renegade dwarves using their marks to turn a profit
prompts: Are you a part of House Kundarak? If so, do you bear the Mark of Warding? Or do you bear the Mark without being a member of the House?
If you are in the house, what is your role? What is your opinion of the House?
Where you exiled from your house?
How do you use your mark if you have one?
Did you work at the Dreadhold prison or do you work at another Kundarak prison?
Do you also despise other Mark of Warding dwarves using their powers for personal gain?
Do you help provide security to others and their homes?
racePrompts: Have you left your clan due to a feud with a rival?
Do you seek an ancient artifact of your Dwarven ancestors?
Do you seek to reclaim your ancestors' kingdom from the Daelkyr locked away underground?
Are you a part of the warding house Kundarak or bear the Mark of Warding?
